title: B.C. to test emergency alert system Wednesday
description: B.C. will be testing the emergency alert system Wednesday, sending a text message to cellphones and interrupting TV and radio broadcasts.
content:
B.C. will be testing the emergency alert system Wednesday, sending a text message to cellphones and interrupting TV and radio broadcasts.
The test will take place at 1:55 p.m., according to officials.
